description:
This game offers a plethora of adorable anime characters waiting to be unlocked, accompanied by numerous puzzles and delightful surprises. 

Challenge your brain and unleash your creativity as you explore the perfect perspectives. 
Through strategic piece rotations, you'll witness the magic of everything falling into place flawlessly. 
Take a moment to unwind and immerse yourself in the masterpieces you'll create, knowing that the game automatically saves each puzzle. 

With its minimalistic yet enjoyable gameplay, Anime Poly Puzzle - Sci-Fi Maidens blends relaxation and fun seamlessly.
name: Anime Poly Puzzle - Sci-Fi Maidens
